Kite: After the crash hit... We didn't get the full picture from the news, but I knew there were so many people who needed help.
I'd done some racing on a team through school, so I figured I had a bit piloting experience already.
When the planetary government asked for volunteers... I thought I could help. That I had a responsability to do so.

I realized how badly out of my depth I was. I wanted to go home.
My flying was alright, but I'd never fired a weapon before. I sucked. The first time I went against some Hive drones I almost died.
